bug.author: ericl
bug.summary: [tune] Trial result directory no longer includes the experiment tag
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
The trial result directory no longer includes hyperparameters in the name, which makes it hard to filter trials by regex in TensorBoard. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/richardliaw>@richardliaw</denchmark-link>
